data.question: What is the molecular formula of the asymmetric unit in the crystalline sponge-3 complex?
What is the molecular weight of the crystalline sponge-3 complex?
What color and habit does the crystal of the crystalline sponge-3 complex have?
What is the crystal system of the crystalline sponge-3 complex?

What is the Flack parameter (Parsons) value for the crystalline sponge-3 complex?

What is the final R1 value in the refinement of the crystalline sponge-3 complex?

What is the highest electron density maximum in the final refinement of the crystalline sponge-3 complex?
Is the crystal color of the crystalline sponge-3 complex blue?
data.answer: False, the crystal color is colorless.

data.question: Does the crystalline sponge-3 complex have a cubic crystal system?
data.answer: False, the crystal system is monoclinic.

data.question: Is the space group of the crystalline sponge-3 complex P2/c?
data.answer: False, the space group is C2.

data.question: Is the Flack parameter (Parsons) value for the crystalline sponge-3 complex 0.100(6)?
data.answer: False, the Flack parameter (Parsons) value is 0.057(6).

data.question: Is the CCDC number for the crystalline sponge-3 complex 1234567?
Is the final R1 value in the refinement of the crystalline sponge-3 complex 0.0502?
data.answer: False, the final R1 value is 0.0602.

data.question: Were 2000 parameters used in the final refinement of the crystalline sponge-3 complex?
Is the highest electron density maximum in the final refinement of the crystalline sponge-3 complex 2.000?
data.answer: False, the highest electron density maximum is 1.565.

data.question: What is the crystal habit of the crystalline sponge-3 complex?
Based on the Flack parameter (Parsons) value, can the absolute configuration of the crystalline sponge-3 complex be considered reliable?
data.answer: Yes, because the Flack parameter (Parsons) value is close to 0, indicating a reliable absolute configuration.
